DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Consultant 's clinical diagnosis Stanford type A AAD use local pathway diagnosis , may include clinical history , chest radiography ( Xrays ) , transthoracic ultrasound , contrastenhanced compute tomography ( CT ) magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) Patients age 18 65 year Eligible AAD surgery Exclusion Criteria Have coronary heart disease , heart failure , severe cardiac tamponade , unstable hemodynamics , severe nervous system abnormality , clinically apparent malperfusion [ 9 ] include low limb , cerebral , coronary renal malperfusion , visceral ischemia , sever hepatic renal abnormality Have undergone cardiac thoracic surgery Are unlikely able perform require clinical assessment task Have significant cognitive impairment language issue Are unable provide consent regard participation study Prescribed nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug corticosteroid admission
